alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin; Jefferson; Larue; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Spencer, Shelby, Nelson, northern Larue, Jefferson, northern Hardin and Bullitt Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lincolnshire to 11 miles southwest of Shepherdsville to 7 miles northwest of Elizabethtown. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... St. Matthews, Lyndon, Hurstbourne, Graymoor-Devondale, Windy Hills, Hurstbourne Acres, St. Regis Park, Beechwood Village, West Buechel and Barbourmeade around 400 PM EDT. Jeffersontown, Douglass Hills, Anchorage, Blue Ridge Manor, Woodland Hills, Creekside, Sycamore and Keeneland around 405 PM EDT. Middletown around 410 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Shelbyville and Bardstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bullitt; Hardin; Jefferson; Larue; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer
